description: Read EIA-608 Closed Caption codes from input video and write them to frame metadata.
name: readeia608

options.description: set from which line to scan for codes (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: scan_min

options.description: set to which line to scan for codes (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 29)
options.name: scan_max

options.description: set ratio of width reserved for sync code detection (from 0.1 to 0.7) (default 0.27)
options.name: spw

options.description: check and apply parity bit (default false)
options.name: chp

options.description: lowpass line prior to processing (default true)
options.name: lp
